document.discussion_title: Fresh, local and good: The Clean Plate Kitchen earns rave review
document.topic_text: CLINTON-- Months after ditching a dining experience that focused more on its location than its food, Anthony and Nicole Piazza, owners of The Clean Plate Kitchen in downtown Clinton , have been met with great success and rave reviews. In
document.post: CLINTON-- Months after ditching a dining experience that focused more on its location than its food, Anthony and Nicole Piazza, owners of The Clean Plate Kitchen in downtown Clinton , have been met with great success and rave reviews. In
